text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I'm the student council president, sakura laurel!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: What?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
No way, no way, I'm kidding! Airgrove-chan 
is looking at me with a scary face, 
so I won't say it again!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I heard that only the two Student 
Council members were going to support you this 
time, so I volunteered to help!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
There was a time when I wasn't involved in 
Academy events because I had a lot of time off, 
so… I wanted to do more and more fun things♪

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I see… So that's it. Which means Pres isn't here.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What, are you worried about just us?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…! No, Vodka is a terrible choice of words! All 
I did was confirm the facts…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Wow! That's our one and only rival for you. You 
really are close.

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: We're not friends! We're not!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Don't copy me! Don't copy me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh! So this is the famous performance 
Fujiki Seki-chan was talking about! 
It's perfect for fighting!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
*sigh* Looks like I've explained enough. Laurel, 
Brian, I need to talk to you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The two ambassadors are busy preparing for the light-up 
ceremony. There's a place for the music to be performed before 
it lights up, so I want to create an environment where I can 
concentrate.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
So instead, I decided to give her the support 
she needs. I'll be in charge of Scarlett and 
Brian will handle Vodka.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Vodka is attached to you. If you support 
her from nearby, you should be able 
to maintain your motivation.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
For the same reason, I'll be with Scarlet. She's 
always watching my every move.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Okay.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…Is that it? You don't want to do it, you don't 
want to do it, you don't want to do it, you're 
better off running… What's wrong with you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You want me to tell you?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You can say that. But honestly, it's creepy when 
you're this cooperative.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You're the one who chased me around and dragged 
me here. You kept telling me I had to succeed…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That's true, but you don't usually listen. Is 
there a reason?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…Not really. I'm just comparing the workload to 
the workload. Besides…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: We have more time than before.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, whatever. I'll keep going, but I need you 
to support Laurel as a whole. I might end up 
with more minor chores. Is that all right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Of course! That's what I wanted to 
do! I'll do my best in your place! 
You're doing something else, right?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. There's a plan that's making a big move on 
a different matter at the same time. I decided 
to focus on that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Normally, even if I'm the one in charge, I won't miss out on 
reporting to Pres. However, I strongly wished for her to leave 
this matter to us.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…A lot happened, but I managed to get 
permission. To tell you the truth, I've overcome 
the biggest obstacle in this job.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Wow. You're so responsible, Prez… You want to 
know everything, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That's the kind of person she is. That's why 
we're going to make this event a success. I need 
you to see how perfect our work is…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you! You really do want 
to do your best for Pres.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Pres, huh…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …What's with that face?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Not really. Are you done talking about work?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I gave you the outline of the lighting ceremony, and I 
told you about the distribution of work. Right now, there's 
nothing to worry about… No, there's a fight between Vodka and 
Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
It's not really a problem. They're the 
same as always. I'm sure they'll be 
able to do it at the last minute.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
You're right. Those two are 
rivals. Their one and only…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Hey, Brian, let's do it next year! 
Our one and only rival!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …! I don't get it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Hey, we're done here. We're going home.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, did I get rejected? This is my chance to get 
to know Brian better!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …I see. So that's what you're really after.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Heheh. But she just said, 'I don't get it!' 
There's something I want to tell you―
